name: BIBLIJA.net
short_description:
BIBLIJA.net is a WEB software to display and search Bible in various languages. Written in C++, works as CGI, platforms supported are any that have a GNU C++ compiler 2.95 or greater.
It has very fast (double indexed) and strong search capabilities - wor
